title: Is business a form of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, business is technology, and technology is business … When a technology lacks business, it will lack what we called funding. It can be eaten by anyone who does not cook it. With business without technology is like buying hams and buns, selling it to market without paper bags without your store’s name written on it, and only you may sell it. Or your neighbors may sell theirs too … without you as part of it.And much … much more …. say … no hams or no buns too ;). No one thought of it. Or If the buns are made square even though it taste like hamburger … it shall be called sandwich … But for facts, without technology, people does not know burgers and sandwiches are the same. Or yet they choose to sell the paper bags instead with a burger on it, and does not realizes that a plastic container with burgers on it is much pleasing to sell. Without technology or coordination with business is like an iced tea without iceOr a hot fudge without the chocolate, Or an ice cream cannot be sold in a hot desert. God Bless

Nothing without technology can be a business. When you lay a foot over business,you need to learn all the ups and down.Similarly,when it comes to technology you need to know about all the terminlogies. So considering such facts,its clearly favourable that business is a form of technology,All is got to do is have advancements to everything. Regards Yukti Verma Founder,Thingsncrafts
